org.sd.util.thread
Interface HookedRunnable

All Superinterfaces:
Killable, java.lang.Runnable
public interface HookedRunnable
extends Killable

A runnable with before and after execution hooks.

NOTE: this is the type of runnable executed in a BlockingThreadPool.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Summary
 void exceptionHook(java.lang.Throwable t)
          Hook to be executed if there is an Exception thrown while running.
 void postRunHook()
          Hook to be executed just after the 'run' method when a thread handles this runnable.
 void preRunHook()
          Hook to be executed just before the 'run' method when a thread handles this runnable.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.sd.util.thread.Killable
die

run
 

Method Detail

preRunHook

void preRunHook()
Hook to be executed just before the 'run' method when a thread handles this runnable.

postRunHook

void postRunHook()
Hook to be executed just after the 'run' method when a thread handles this runnable.

exceptionHook

void exceptionHook(java.lang.Throwable t)
Hook to be executed if there is an Exception thrown while running.

This hook is called if there is an exception thrown during preRunHook, run, or postRunHook.
